A4.text: Margrethe II reigned as Queen of Denmark from 14 January 1972 until her abdication on 14 January 2024.

A5.text: Frederiksen has served as Prime Minister of Denmark since 2019

A6.text: Frederiksen was commissioned by Queen Margrethe II to lead negotiations to form a new government, and was sworn in as prime minister on 27 June
